item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, February 16, 2025 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. My Life in Weeks (440 points | 130 comments)
2. Sri Lanka scrambles to restore power after monkey causes islandwide outage (98 points | 63 comments)
3. Show HN: Blunderchess.net – blunder for your opponent every five moves (39 points | 19 comments)
4. The Sims Game Design Documents (1997) (24 points | 4 comments)
5. Watt The Fox? (132 points | 25 comments)
6. Perplexity Deep Research (82 points | 25 comments)
7. Schemesh: Fusion between Unix shell and Lisp REPL (86 points | 19 comments)
8. PAROL6: 3D-printed desktop robotic arm (90 points | 13 comments)
9. Create a QubesOS Gaming HVM with GPU PCI passthrough (2023) (34 points | 9 comments)
10. Small, Light, Robust Phones for a Type 1 Diabetic Child (6 points | 3 comments)
11. Jellyfin: The Free Software Media System (253 points | 170 comments)
12. Product Development Processes You Might Not Have Heard of (2022) (19 points | 1 comment)
13. Jane Street's Figgie card game (378 points | 85 comments)
14. NASA has a list of 10 rules for software development (133 points | 81 comments)
15. Jill – a functional programming language for the Nand2Tetris platform (73 points | 7 comments)
16. The 20 year old PSP can now connect to WPA2 WiFi Networks (404 points | 121 comments)
17. How Medical Research Cuts Would Hit Colleges and Hospitals in Every State (27 points | 6 comments)
18. Carbon capture more costly than switching to renewables, researchers find (424 points | 328 comments)
19. Show HN: Kreuzberg – Modern async Python library for document text extraction (157 points | 59 comments)
20. Multiple Russian Threat Actors Targeting Microsoft Device Code Authentication (133 points | 25 comments)
21. Alzheimer's biomarkers now visible up to a decade ahead of symptoms (142 points | 44 comments)
22. Diablo hackers uncovered a speedrun scandal (179 points | 98 comments)
23. TL;DW: Too Long; Didn't Watch Distill YouTube Videos to the Relevant Information (269 points | 178 comments)
24. New SF public health chief was part of McKinsey opioid-marketing operation (197 points | 66 comments)
25. Surprise Magma Chamber Growing Under Mediterranean Volcano (2023) (35 points | 8 comments)
26. Show HN: Letting LLMs Run a Debugger (132 points | 28 comments)
27. Tea Extensions [pdf] (2006) (4 points | 1 comment)
28. Basketball has evolved into a game of calculated decision-making (76 points | 194 comments)
29. We were wrong about GPUs (799 points | 504 comments)
30. Did Semgrep Just Get a Lot More Interesting? (177 points | 80 comments)
